original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)🔽21.38. Sahetukadukādi, Sanidassanattika🔽Nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa hetuka duka ādi sa ni dassana ttika  na sa hetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na ahetukam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka gaṇitakena tīṇi pañhā saṅkhitta hetuyā
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions for the Occurrence of Phenomena🔽The Section on the Triad with Root-Cause, etc.🔽With root-cause and with object, etc.

analyzed: tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Nasahetukanaanidassanasappaṭighamūlepi tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na sa hetuka na a nidassana sa paṭigha mūle pi tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi
translated: With root-cause and with object and impinging, etc.🔽With root-cause and

original: Nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa hetukam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca ahetukaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka
translated: With non-root-cause, non-object, non-impinging as condition, a non-root-cause, non-object, non-impinging states arise, by root-cause condition. (In brief.) As root-cause, one; as predominance, one; … as non-obstruction, one.

original: (Nahetusampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ sahetukadukasadisaṁ. Tīṇi pañhā. Hetusahetukaduke ca hetuhetusampayuttaduke ca pañhā no labbhati.)
analyzed: na hetu sampayuttam na sanidassana sappaṭigham sa hetuka duka sadisa tīṇi pañhā hetu sahetuka duke ca hetu hetu sampayutta duke ca pañhā no labbhati
translated: (With non-root-cause, non-object, non-impinging, associated with root-cause, there are three questions. The questions as root-cause, root-cause, and root-cause, associated with root-cause, are not applicable.)
